reviews.text:
Delivery was super fast and the rider was polite.
The food was hot and fresh. Best experience so far!

My order arrived late and items were missing.
I contacted support but got no response.

The app UI looks good but is confusing to navigate.
Please make the checkout process simpler.

The packaging was neat and the food tasted great.
Would recommend adding more payment options.

The restaurant canceled my order without explanation.
Refund took too long to process.

Absolutely loved it! Smooth ordering experience and quick delivery.
Will definitely order again.
